title: Interim measure for assuring continuation of
context: [ยง103F-413] Interim measure for assuring continuation of services. If funds are appropriated and available, the chief procurement officer, or a designee, may extend the term of a contract which has not terminated for up to six months after the termination date of the contract, to assure the provision of services to the public without disruption. [L 1997, c 190, pt of ยง2]
